$comment-ENDPOINT: Eval requests will be sent here
author: Deepdrive
$comment-DISPLAY_NAME: Name to be displayed on leaderboard page
$comment-YOUTUBE: [Optional] Video demonstrating the problem to be displayed on leaderboard page
$comment-MAX_SECONDS: [Optional] Max time this problem can run. Default will be 5 minutes if not set
$comment-MAX_MS_PER_STEP: [Optional] Time that agent is allowed to 'think' every step
$comment-VERSION: [Optional] Version of the problem. Change this to rerun bots and ensure scores are withing acceptable ranges.
$comment-ACCEPTABLE_SCORE_DEVIATION: [Optional] Acceptable score deviation from the mean for bots from run to run
$comment-RERUN: [Optional] A field which can be updated to trigger a rerun.
